game_description: BECOME A HUNTER Embrace yourself in Fantasy Hunter VR- hunting game to get the best experience of hunting in a fantasy world. You can dirt your hands with the latest diversity of guns. Load guns promptly and do not miss a single target. AIM PERFECTLY Keep your eye on your prey! Do not miss headshot for furious killing. You will enjoy Fantasy hunting game by shooting wild and fast-moving animals. WATCH YOUR STEP Be Alert! Dangerous and wild animals can hunt you from nowhere. Take your every step with care and tackle your challenges in a skillful manner. Find a safe place from where you can keep eyes on severe animals to hunt. FANTASISE YOUR HUNTING Enjoy the technical tricks to hunt animals which you have always fantasized. Virtual Hunting gives you fantastic chance to enhance your hunting skills in an exceptional way. Keep up the shooting skills and test your guts to survive in this Fantasy Hunter VR-Game.
